LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Grenadier.label: Grenadier
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Grenadier.description:
A bipedal humanoid robot built in the image of other pre-existing mechanoids. Grenadiers are specialized to use light weapons and grenade launchers.
The Grenadier has to carry a battery backpack which makes it unable to fight like other mechs without cover.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Grenadier.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Grenadier.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Kanonier.label: Kanonier
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Kanonier.description:
A bipedal humanoid robot built in the image of other pre-existing mechanoids. Kanoniers are specialized to use rocket launchers or recoilless rifles.
The Kanonier has to carry a battery backpack which makes it unable to fight like other mechs without cover.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Kanonier.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Kanonier.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Kanonier.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Sergeant.label: Sergeant
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Sergeant.description: As a relay command variant of the Soldat, it has a very recognizable disc-shaped omnidirectional radar and transceiver antenna. Sergeants extend a mechanitor's effective range, but due to the weight of its radar equipment it can only equip a light weapon for self defense.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Sergeant.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Sergeant.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Sergeant.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Soldat.label: Soldat
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Soldat.description:
A bipedal humanoid robot built in the image of other pre-existing mechanoids. Soldats can be equipped with weapons rated for human use.
The Soldat has to carry a battery backpack which makes it unable to fight like other mechs without cover.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Soldat.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Soldat.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Soldat.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
